price: 16. Su Señor lo llamó en el valle sagrado de Tua (en la región del Sinaí)
arabic: إِذۡ نَادَىٰهُ رَبُّهُۥ بِٱلۡوَادِ ٱلۡمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: idh nādāhu rabbuhu bil-wādi al-muqadasi ṭuwan
